title: A Gallery of Children
description: A series of short stories by A. A. Milne which he described as 'a fanciful elaboration of each picture' to accompany the delightful original illustrations.A re-issue of the famous ode to childhood by A A Milne. In 1925 Henriette Willebeek Le Mair was commissioned by the Colgate company to produce a series of illustrations for magazine advertising. The public imagination was so captured by these that AA Milne wrote an accompanying collection of short stories - A Gallery of Children .
author: A.A. Milne
